title: NASA CubeSats steer toward Mars
content: https://phys.org/news/2018-06-nasa-cubesats-mars.amp    NASA has achieved a first for the class of tiny spacecraft known as CubeSats, which are opening new access to space.    Over the past week, two CubeSats called MarCO-A and MarCO-B have been firing their propulsion systems to guide themselves toward Mars. This process, called a...     NASA CubeSats steer toward Mars

https://phys.org/news/2018-06-nasa-cubesats-mars.amp

NASA has achieved a first for the class of tiny spacecraft known as CubeSats, which are opening new access to space.

Over the past week, two CubeSats called MarCO-A and MarCO-B have been firing their propulsion systems to guide themselves toward Mars. This process, called a...
